review: The unit I received seemed buggy from day one but I figured that I would just have to live with it since it was such a new product that the rough edges just hadn't been smoothed out yet.I only use it for an hour or two a couple of times a week so I fugured with such light use it would las t a while and I could just live with the occasional freeze-ups...well, those "occasional freeze-ups" have become more and more frequent and now, not quite a year later, the unit has pretty much dies on me. I will be very liberal and say that it only had about 120 hours of actual use on it before it died.
